scenes.background: You suggested reviewing the presentation first. [Monica] seems a bit impatient.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'We don't have much time. Can we just decide on the report now?'

options.text: Let's sort out the presentation first, then we can tackle the report.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by sticking to your plan, but empathy could improve by addressing Monica's urgency.

options.text: I understand the urgency. Let's quickly decide on the report and then move to the presentation.
options.analysis: You show strong emotional perception and empathy by acknowledging Monica's concern, but self-regulation and motivation might suffer due to changing focus.

options.text: We could split our attention. I'll start on the report while you both continue on the presentation.
options.analysis: You show high motivation by offering to multitask, but emotional perception and social skills could be improved by considering the overall team dynamics.
